title: Meet the Professor
name: Prof. Fabiano Índio
bioAfterLink: and one of the most respected professors in Brazil. Years of dedication to the sport and to building champions — Índio brings a clear, effective way of teaching that works for every body type. Don't wait — come train with us.
bio: Founder of Índio Jiu Jitsu Team school, affiliated with JA Índio Jiu Jitsu, he's also the creator of @indiodrills and one of the most respected professors in Brazil. Years of dedication to the sport and to building champions — Índio brings a clear, effective way of teaching that works for every body type. Don't wait — come train with us.
quote: "My job isn't just to teach techniques — it's to pass on the values of martial arts and help students face whatever life throws at them."
